thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: The Pariah
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 The Pariah

author: The Pariah
title: The Pariah
text:
Dealing with BangGood is without problems. I have placed at least 10 orders with BangGood and have not had a problem with any orders. On a couple of orders some of the items were backordered. I was informed of the backorder in a timely manner and given appropriate choices. When a particular item was unavailable a credit was issued quickly.
One particular order appeared to have disappeared in transit. It appeared to me that it disappeared in US Customs. After six weeks BangGood reshipped the items which arrived in eighteen days. The original order finally reappeared on USPS tracking and arrived two full months after shipping.
I heartily recommend BangGood as a quality supplier.
